{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/ro/advanced-search-button-style": { "created": "20150519114003182", "text": "/* Hide advanced search button */\n.tc-image-advanced-search-button.tc-image-button {\n padding-left: 15px;\n}", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/advanced-search-button-style", "tags": "$:/tags/advanced-search-button", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230134649191", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/change-settings": { "created": "20161108100322449", "text": "!!4) Settings\nTo customise the behaviour of TiddlyWiki\n\n{{$:/snippets/viewswitcher}}\n{{$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-layout}}\n{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings}}\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/change-settings", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230134715488", "caption": "4. Settings" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/help": { "created": "20140716184603499", "text": "!! Help\n\nBefore you 'publish' your ~TiddlyWiki:\n\n# Make a backup of your wiki\n# Get a defined start-up situation for your TW:\n#* Define your starting tiddler(s) in [[$:/DefaultTiddlers]]\n#* If required, define the state of the sidebar tabs\n#* If required create a tiddler (e.g. `xyz`) which transcludes $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish to create another option to return from readonly to edit mode\n#* If required change the keyboard shortut (Ctrl-Shift-Alt-P) for opening $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish via Control Panel > Keyboard Shortcuts\n# Follow the procedure given in tabs 1 to 5.\n\nThere are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode:\n\n# Press the configured keyboard shortcut (default Ctrl-Shift-Alt-P), which opens $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish\n# Start the TW with `#xyz` appended which opens $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish\n# Search for:\n#* ''Publish'' to get to $:/plugins/tg/ro/publish\n#* ''~ControlPanel'' to get to ''$:/ControlPanel > Appearance > Publish''\n\n<<<\n''Note:''
\n@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@\n<<<\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/help", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20200318122932944", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Help" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-buttons": { "created": "20161108100124814", "text": "!! Show/hide sidebar buttons\nUncheck to hide the appropriate sidebar button\n\n|Button |visible |note |h\n|Sidebar button (<>/<>) | <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu\" tag=\"$:/tags/TopRightBar\"/> | 1 |\n|Advanced search button (<>) | <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/tg/ro/advanced-search-button-style\" tag=\"$:/tags/Stylesheet\" invertTag=\"yes\"/> | 1 |\n|Publish button (<>) | <$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish-button\" tag=\"$:/tags/TopRightBar\"/> | 2 |\n\n<<<\n''Note:''\n\n# Although 'invisible' (`display:none;`), ''Sidebar'' and ''Advanced search'' buttons stay active!\n# The ''Publish'' button is invisible and inactive (`$:/tags/TopRightBar` removed)\n<<<", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-buttons", "tags": "", "modified": "20200316123412336", "caption": "3. Sidebar buttons" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-tabs": { "text": "\\define check()\n<$checkbox\ntag=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"\nchecked=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"\nunchecked=\"$:/tags/hide\"\ndefault=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"\ncheckactions=\"\"\"<$action-deletefield tags/><$action-setfield tags=\"$:/tags/SideBar\"/>\"\"\"\nuncheckactions=\"\"\"<$action-deletefield tags/><$action-setfield tags=\"$:/tags/hide\"/>\"\"\"\n<$link to={{!!title}}> \n<$transclude field=\"caption\">\n<$view field=\"title\"/>\n\n\n\\end\n\n!! Show/hide sidebar tabs\nUncheck to hide the appropriate sidebar tab\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SideBar]]\">
\n<>\n\n<$list filter=\"[tag[$:/tags/hide]]\">
\n<>\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-sidebar-tabs", "tags": "", "modified": "20200319201054427", "created": "20161108100017749", "caption": "2. Sidebar tabs" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-toolbar-buttons": { "created": "20161108095713019", "text": "!! Hide toolbar buttons\n\nDisable in Control panel (Appearance > Toolbars) the buttons you do not need in read-only mode.\n\n''//Disable at least the following buttons://''\n\n* ~ViewToolbar\n** Edit button <>\n** More button <>\n** Info button <> (Tools tab contains button configuration!)\n* Page control buttons\n** New tiddler button <>\n** Control panel button <>\n** Save button <>\n** More button <>\n\n{{$:/language/ControlPanel/Toolbars/Hint}}\n\n
\n<>\n
", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/hide-toolbar-buttons", "tags": "", "modified": "20200319203659025", "caption": "1. Buttons" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/icon": { "created": "20170322100000766", "text": "", "type": "image/svg+xml", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/icon", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230134918451" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/image-save-button": { "created": "20140715185836189", "text": "", "creator": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230134931683", "modifier": "TonGerner", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/image-save-button" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/publish": { "created": "20170322105731731", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230134946688" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/license": { "created": "20180124175202510", "text": "[[Readonly plugin|http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/#Readonly%20plugin]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2020\n\nMIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/license", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230135005582" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish": { "created": "20140715185723459", "text": "!! Readonly plugin\n<>\n\n\n\n\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230135048784", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Publish" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish-button": { "created": "20170506162930803", "text": "<$button class=\"tc-btn-invisible\" tooltip=\"Publish read-only\">\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-open-window\" $param=\"$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish\" height=\"700px\" width=\"550px\"/>\n{{$:/plugins/tg/ro/images/publish}}\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish-button", "tags": "$:/tags/publish-button $:/tags/TopRightBar", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191231184447737", "list-before": "$:/core/ui/TopBar/menu", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/readme": { "text": "A plugin to make ~TiddlyWiki read-only.\n\nYou can hide:\n\n* ''All'' toolbar buttons\n* 'Sidebar' button (to switch Sidebar) and 'Advanced search' button (next to Search)\n* All Sidebar tabs tagged with $:/tags/SideBar.\n\nClick the Publish button <> next to the sidebar button <>/<> to start making your TW 'publish-ready'. A new window with six tabs opens. Read the Help tab and follow the 5 steps.\n\n<<<\n''Note:''
@@.RED Although you can hide the 'Sidebar' button and 'Advanced Search' button, they remain 'active'!@@\n<<<\n\nThere are a few ways to return from readonly to edit mode, see [[Help|$:/plugins/tg/ro/help]].\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/readme", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20200319200627098", "creator": "TonGerner", "created": "20140821172500339" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save": { "created": "20161108100434387", "text": "! Save\n\n{{$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Saving}}\n\n@@.BLUE ''Save''@@ {{$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button}}\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230135228815", "caption": "5. Save" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button": { "created": "20170405200808621", "text": "<$button message=\"tm-save-wiki\" param={{$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Template}}>\n\n{{$:/plugins/tg/ro/image-save-button}}\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/save-button", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230135303043", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-button-style": { "created": "20140715185800387", "text": "/* Hide sidebar button */\nsvg.tc-image-chevron-left {\n display: none;\n}\n\nsvg.tc-image-chevron-right {\n display: none;\n}\n", "type": "text/css", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-button-style", "tags": "$:/tags/sidebar-button", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191230135322974", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-layout": { "created": "20170307110734575", "text": "\\define lingo-base() $:/language/ThemeTweaks/\n\nSidebar layout: <$select tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout\">\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/sidebar-layout", "tags": "", "modified": "20191230135338759" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/styles": { "created": "20161104132710834", "text": "/* Slider style */\n\nhtml .tgc-slider {\n color: #5778D8;\n font-weight: bold;\n}\n\n.tgc-slider:hover {\n color: #5778D8;\n text-decoration: underline;\n}\n\n.RED {\n color: red;\n font-weight: bold;\n}", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/styles", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "modified": "20191230135353718", "type": "text/css" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/macros/doc": { "created": "20200316122632179", "text": "\\define icn(icon)\n\n\\end", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/macros/doc", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modified": "20200316123614203" }, "$:/plugins/tg/ro/shortcut/publish": { "created": "20200317164804429", "text": "<$navigator story=\"$:/StoryList\">\n<$action-navigate $to=\"$:/plugins/tg/ro/publish\"/>\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/ro/shortcut/publish", "tags": "$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut", "modified": "20200317185519894", "key": "((publish))" }, "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/publish": { "created": "20200317164006337", "text": "Open Publish window", "title": "$:/config/ShortcutInfo/publish", "tags": "", "modified": "20200317164305031" }, "$:/config/shortcuts/publish": { "created": "20200317164439679", "text": "ctrl-shift-alt-P", "title": "$:/config/shortcuts/publish", "modified": "20200318102428021" } } }
author: TonGerner
name: Makes TW readonly
title: $:/plugins/tg/ro
